summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on April 13, 2011. The email contains a brief message requesting a call back and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on April 13, 2011.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
Jeffrey Epstein requests Jes Staley to call him back.
